name: BB's Bites
description:
you play as BB-8 (mickey don't sue), a cat who loves treats. the objective is to collect the maximum amount of treats in a short time frame. be aware of BB-H8, as crossing paths with her can mean losing 1 of your 9 lives. also look out for raisins, they're bad for cats. 

directions - a/d/left/right - move bb left or right - w/up jump
